name: Tuxler
tag_list: online-privacy, social-proxy-network, proxy, geo-targeting, productivity, social-marketing
overview:
Tuxler is a free global online privacy solution. It helps you share your connection location safely, surf the web locally without being local, access any blocked content on the Internet, encrypt your datas, and protect your privacy.

Our solution is built around a proxy network with thousands of different locations available. Users find it very easy to surf the web without borders. At any time we have hundreds of connection locations available. Our ever growing network gives our users a reach through the Internet that changes the entire perspective of the Web. We reduced the process of changing location to a “one click” process, making it able to be used by anybody. Basically, you chose the destination where you want to access the Internet from, and a couple of seconds after, you’re already locally browsing the web while staying home behind your computer.

Many major corporations and web specialists end up using Tuxler as a business solution, although it’s primary target is the general public. It offers a truly innovative solution for online publishers, marketers, brands and professionals to browse Web content the way it is locally without being local. It makes it very easy to optimize the media buying process, gain insight on creatives, understand your competition’s behavior, streamline operations globally and ensure compliance. We don’t share our user’s datas as other solutions with our corporate customers, we help them target their global and local marketing campaigns, ameliorate their Return On Investment by showing which displayed ads have a better local impact.

Tuxler is available for Windows XP/Vista/7 and for Mac OS X.

external_links.title: Old Proxy Industry Finally Enters Social Network Era with Tuxler  Read more: http://www.sfgate.com/bOld Proxy Industry Finally Enters Social Network
